ing: 2 large potatoes, peeled and coarsely shredded
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed
n: Polpette di Patate Fritte (Potato and Prosciutto Fritters)
des: "A simple and tasty dish that kids love and a good alternative to fries. You only need a few ingredients and dinner can be ready in no time at all."
ins:
Place shredded potatoes in a bowl; add flour, egg, and ham and mix well. Season mixture with salt and pepper. Form mixture into fritters.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat; fry fritters until golden, about 5 minutes per side.
